name: Loulan Navy HQ
desc: The headquarters of the Loulan Navy, where a large number of ship crews and marines are stationed: it's no exaggeration to say that the entire industrial output of Adenium Obesum is at its service. A huge number of ships are also on station, as preparation in case a major war starts. Loulan Industries' R&D department is also stationed here, developing new ships and weapons, while their naval academy can boast a large number of skilled graduates as officers.
